All these labels are based on Tatu et al., Neurology 1998 & re-released under CC4.0 (free to use for all purposes)

CortVascTerritoriesTatu.nii: original labels from Tatu et al

ATTbasedFlowTerritories.nii: 
Flow territories adapted by PreDIVA manuscript, as deposited online at figshare.com (doi:http://dx.doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.1488674)
https://figshare.com/articles/ATT_based_flow_territories/1488674
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ (CC BY 4.0 license)

LabelTerritories.nii: created by HJMM Mutsaerts based on Tatu et al.

TatuICA_PCA.nii: anterior & posterior regions based on Tatu et al.
